titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on rifabutin (dosage form).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1390)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on rifabutin (dosage form).
